6.6 DUIM-Graphics Module

destroy-pixmap

Generic function

Summary

Destroys the specified pixmap.

Signature

destroy-pixmap pixmap => ()

Arguments

pixmap
An instance of type <pixmap>.

Values

None

Library

duim-graphics

Module

duim-graphics

Description

Destroys pixmap.

See also

draw-pixmap, page 425

Library

duim-graphics

Module

duim-graphics
Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
